name: Botlike - a robot's rampage
description: Botlike - loot and shoot your way through hordes of robots or die trying. Play as S.I.R. - a grumpy old warbot on his path to revenge. Use your ever-growing arsenal of weapons, upgrades and powerful items to defeat an evil and totalitarian robot league. Grab your top hat and let the rampage begin!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ (64 bit) Processor: Intel i5+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 5750+ Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.3+
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ (64 bit) Processor: Intel i5+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti+ Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.3+
